item.title: Fast Pace Health: Zero Phishing Incidents Since Harmony Email & Collaboration Implementation
item.description: Healthcare entities have a 51% probability of falling victim to phishing attacks. Healthcare providers are seeing an 81% uptick in threats, especially as cyber criminals weaponize increasingly advanced methods, and some organizations are struggling to keep pace. item.title: How devops use cases in healthcare?
item.description:
In the rapidly evolving healthcare industry, the integration of DevOps—a collaborative approach that unifies software development (Dev) and IT operations (Ops)—is transforming the delivery of medical services.
